name: agentc-ai-developer
description: Brief Minimo methodology with integrated setup: /brief for planning (Microprocesso 1.1) → /setup-local-observability for environment setup (Microprocesso 1.2) with microprocesso-1-2 skill → /update-claude-md for project integration.
